text: This is a list of Dutch television related events from 1971. ==Events== ==Debuts== ==Television shows== ===1950s=== *NOS Journaal (1956–present) *Pipo de Clown (1958-1980) ==Ending this year== ==Births== *18 January - Peggy Jane de Schepper, actress *22 January - Wendy van Dijk, actress & TV presenter *31 January - Sylvana Simons, TV & radio presenter *10 June - Reinout Oerlemans, actor, director, TV presenter & producer ==Deaths==
title: 1971 in Dutch television
